about_the_game:
Through hail and blood and fire, and wall of barbs and clashing steel. Through mosh pit or horde and rain-soaked streets with not one taxi in sight, we follow yae, Queen Dani!

Customize your slayers with our premium character pack, which includes a unique costume and weapon from the HELL-A Catwalk Collection.

Gaelic Queen Dani includes:

- Thoroughly Modern Medb skin for Dani
- The Brainzzz-Biter - this weapon can be used by any of the 6 slayers

Gaelic Queen Dani is included in the Expansion Pass.

content_descriptors.notes: Dead Island 2: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Intense Violence or Gore, Suggestive Themes, Strong Language, Use of Drugs, General Mature Content.
